name: Down (CloudGames)
description:
Down is 2D endless runner game inspired by the Movie Soul, its still work in progress, the save and load options still not implemented.

HOW TO PLAY:

Use A,D keyboard keys to navigate left/ right respectively.

Use Spacebar to dash a level down.

Use R key to activate a Shield that can kill Reapers (your enemies).

collect Souls to advance in Light Years, avoid Reapers as they bring you back up and reduce  the light years traveled.

This game was implemented in 3 days for the ITI, Egypt mini game jam by:

  1. Art:
    1. Dina El-Shribiny
    2. Rehave Ali
    3. Islam Magdy
  2. Programmers:
    1. Doha Emad
    2. Islam Rabie
    3. Mohammed Saad

Also all thanks to the creator of 52SpecialEffectPack unity package for providing the VFX.
